dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey there, Host_B. Um, big news breaking, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey there, Host_B. Um, big news breaking, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Host_A, absolutely. We've got some pretty tragic news out of Kazakhstan, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Host_A, absolutely. We've got some pretty tragic news out of Kazakhstan, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A plane crash occurred near Zholaman Airfield outside Astana, resulting in fatalities, citing the Ministry of Transport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. What's, like, what's going on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. What's, like, what's going on?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a plane crash, um, happened near Zholaman Airfield, just outside Astana. And, uh, it's resulted in fatalities, unfortunately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a plane crash, um, happened near Zholaman Airfield, just outside Astana. And, uh, it's resulted in fatalities, unfortunately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A plane crash occurred near Zholaman Airfield outside Astana, resulting in fatalities, citing the Ministry of Transport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fatalities? Oh, man. Do we know, like, what kind of plane it was?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fatalities? Oh, man. Do we know, like, what kind of plane it was?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it was a light aircraft, a TL-2000. And it was privately owned, which is, um, kinda interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it was a light aircraft, a T L two thousand. And it was privately owned, which is, um, kinda interesting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...an aviation incident occurred involving a light aircraft, the TL-2000. The aircraft was privately owned.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Privately owned? Wow. [interrupts] And this was, like, a training flight, I heard?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Privately owned? Wow. And this was, like, a training flight, I heard?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...during a training flight near Zholaman Airfield (Astana), an aviation incident occurred involving a light aircraft, the TL-2000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's right, yeah. June 22nd, 2025, around 11:30 AM. It was, um, during a training flight. Both crew members, unfortunately, died.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right, yeah. June twenty second, twenty twenty five, around eleven:thirty A M. It was, um, during a training flight. Both crew members, unfortunately, died.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 22, 2025, at approximately 11:30 a.m., during a training flight near Zholaman Airfield (Astana), an aviation incident occurred... According to preliminary information, two crew members were on board, both of whom died,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So two people on board, both gone. Just awful. What happens next? Is there, like, an investigation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So two people on board, both gone. Just awful. What happens next? Is there, like, an investigation?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to preliminary information, two crew members were on board, both of whom died,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The Ministry of Transport is forming a commission. They've already got, uh, investigators dispatched to the crash site.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The Ministry of Transport is forming a commission. They've already got, uh, investigators dispatched to the crash site.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A commission will be formed to investigate the incident. "Employees of the Department for the Investigation of Transport Accidents and Incidents of the Ministry of Transport of the Republic of Kazakhstan have been dispatched to the crash site," the ministry added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, good. So they're on it. And this Zholaman Airfield, I'm not super familiar with it. Is it, like, far from Astana?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, good. So they're on it. And this Zholaman Airfield, I'm not super familiar with it. Is it, like, far from Astana?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, not really. It's, um, in the Shortandy district, Akmola region. About 13 kilometers from downtown Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not really. It's, um, in the Shortandy district, Akmola region. About thirteen kilometers from downtown Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zholaman Airfield is located in the Shortandy district of the Akmola region, approximately 13 kilometers from downtown Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so relatively close then. [interrupts] Just a really, really sad situation all around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so relatively close then. Just a really, really sad situation all around.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Our thoughts go out to, um, everyone affected by this tragedy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Our thoughts go out to, um, everyone affected by this tragedy.
